accounts:
  groups:
  - gid: 1030
    name: group1
  - gid: 1050
    name: group2
  - gid: 1060
    name: user3
  users:
  - description: description 2
    expires: "1970-01-01"
    gid: 1050
    groups:
    - group1
    home: /home/home2
    name: user2
    password: $6$BhyxFBgrEFh0VrPJ$MllG8auiU26x2pmzL4.1maHzPHrA.4gTdCvlATFp8HJU9UPee4zCS9BVl2HOzKaUYD/zEm8r/OF05F2icWB0K/
    shell: /bin/sh
    ssh_keys:
    - ssh-rsa 
      root@localhost
    uid: 1020
  - expires: "1970-01-01"
    gid: 1060
    name: user3
    uid: 1060
fsnodes:
- contents:
    text: |
      [Unit]
      Description=Custom service

      [Service]
      ExecStart=/usr/bin/false

      [Install]
      WantedBy=multi-user.target
  path: /etc/systemd/system/custom.service
  type: file
- contents:
    text: |
      [Service]
      ExecStart=
      ExecStart=/usr/bin/cat /etc/custom_file.txt
  path: /etc/systemd/system/custom.service.d/override.conf
  type: file
- contents:
    text: image builder is the best
  group: root
  path: /etc/custom_file.txt
  type: file
  user: root
- group: "0"
  path: /etc/empty_file.txt
  type: file
  user: "0"
- path: /etc/systemd/system/custom.service.d
  type: dir
- group: "1050"
  mode: "0770"
  path: /etc/custom_dir
  type: dir
  user: "1020"
systemd:
  enabled:
  - custom.service
